summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackCurlsmith Curl Defining Styling Souffl√© is a strong hold curl styling gel that provides moisture, shine and flexible definition for all curl types.
details: DetailsBenefitsKeeps curls bouncy, and shinyDesigned to provide moisturized defined curls that lastFor beautifuly smoothed styled curlsA silky custard formulated with Babassu Oil known for its moisturizing propertiesFeaturesBEST FOR: Defined, moisturized long-lasting styleFORMAT: Custard GelHOLD LEVEL: 8- Strong holdFEELS LIKE: Semi solid jell-oColor-SafeMade without sulphates, silicones or drying alcoholsItem 2643523How To UseUse on wet hair. Take a dime sized amount per hair section. Rake and smooth the product throughout your strands to evenly coat them. Select your desired styling technique (scrunch/finger curls/shingle) to enhance and define. Air dry or diffuse. When fully dry, scrunch to break the cast.IngredientsWater (Aqua / Eau), Glycerin, Babassu Oil Polyglyceryl-4 Esters, Sorbitol, Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan), PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Carapa Guaianensis Seed Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Piper Nigrum (Black Pepper) Seed Extract, Selaginella Lepidophylla Extract, Glyceryl Caprylate, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene, Linalool, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Pinene, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes.*Organic Ingredient
how_to_use: Use on wet hair. Take a dime sized amount per hair section. Rake and smooth the product throughout your strands to evenly coat them. Select your desired styling technique (scrunch/finger curls/shingle) to enhance and define. Air dry or diffuse. When fully dry, scrunch to break the cast.
